page.title: 09BIOGRAPHY
page.content: JAMES LOMAX WAS A WELL KNOWN LORD OF THE MANOR OF GT. HARWOOD.HE BUILT AND LIVED AT ALLSPRINGS LODGE.HE WAS A LOCAL LAND OWNER. OWNING 2,865 ACRES OF COUNTRYSIDE.GREAT CHANGES TOOK PLACE IN GT. HARWOD DURING HIS LIFETIME.POPULATION GREW FROM 1,659 TO 9,000.THERE WAS A GREAT CHANGE FROM AGRICULTURE TO COTTON MANUFACTURE. JAMES LOMAX BUILT OUR LADY AND ST. HUBERTS CHURCH AND IT OPENED IN 1859.HE WAS EDUCATED AT NEARBY STONEYHURST COLLEGE, HE WAS A GREAT BENEFACTOR FOR ROMAN CATHOLIC RELIGION IN THE AREA.
